alert.note: Alert for Box Elder (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 5:29PM MDT until June 27 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Box Elder County in northern Utah... * Until 600 PM MDT * At 528 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Snowville to 11 miles west of Howell, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Mesonet sensors reported wind gusts to 60 mph. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Snowville and Howell. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 near mile marker 388. Interstate 84 between mile markers 1 and 33. Utah Route 30 between mile markers 86 and 90. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
